meanings.definition: A person who rides a horse.
meanings.sent1: The horsemen rode swiftly across the field.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of horsemen galloping in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The horsemen tried to race each other but ended up in a funny tumble.
meanings.sent4: The horsemen charged into battle like a fierce storm.
meanings.sent5: The image of the horsemen on their steeds was etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of soldiers or warriors on horseback.
meanings.sent1: The horsemen were armed and ready for combat.
meanings.sent2: The king's army included skilled horsemen for cavalry attacks.
meanings.sent3: The horsemen jokingly pretended to have a jousting tournament.
meanings.sent4: The horsemen stood tall and proud, a symbol of strength and unity.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the horsemen riding together was awe-inspiring.
